title.en: Prayer to Rigdzin Jigme Lingpa Invoking His Previous Incarnations

text.en: Protector, lord presiding over the whole of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa, Samantabhadra,
text.en-trans: gönpo sizhi khyabdak kuntuzang

text.en: Whose very essence is the “ground continuum,” thesugatagarbha;
text.en-trans: zhi gyü deshek nyingpö ngowo nyi

text.en: Avalokiteśvara, the manifestation of emptiness and compassion;
text.en-trans: tongnyi nyingjer sharwa chenrezik

text.en: And Garab Dorje—to you we pray!
text.en-trans: garab dorjé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: You manifested as the son of King Kṛkin in the presence of Buddha Kāśyapa,1
text.en-trans: chomden ösung drung na krikri sé

text.en: As Nanda, the younger brother of the Kinsman of the Sun,
text.en-trans: nyimé nyen gyi ché gyur chung dzé ga

text.en: As Akaramati emanated by King Songtsen Gampo,2
text.en-trans: songtsen gampö namtrul akarma

text.en: And as King Tri Songdetsen—to you we pray!
text.en-trans: trisong detsen zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Mahāsiddha Virūpa and Princess Pemasal,
text.en-trans: birwapa dang lhacham pema sal

text.en: Vihāradhāra3in person, venerable Gyalse Lharje,4
text.en-trans: tsuklak dzin ngö gyalsé lharjé zhab

text.en: Drime Künden,5Yarje Orgyen Lingpa,6
text.en-trans: drimé künden yar jé orgyen ling

text.en: Dawö Shyönnu7and Jetsün Drakpa Gyaltsen,8to you we pray!
text.en-trans: da ö zhönnu drakgyal solwa deb

text.en: Samyépa, the actual manifestation of Mahāpaṇḍita Vimalamitra,9
text.en-trans: penchen bimé ngötrul samyépa

text.en: Ngari Paṇchen,10Chögyal Püntsok,11
text.en-trans: ngari penchen chögyal püntsok zhab

text.en: Tashi Tobgyal,12Dzamling Dorje,13
text.en-trans: tashi tobgyal dzamling dorjé gar

text.en: And Jigme Lingpa, to you we pray!
text.en-trans: jikme lingpar gyur la solwa deb

text.en: Later, manifesting as Yeshe Dorje,
text.en-trans: di ok yeshe dorjé rolpa yi

text.en: You will uphold the tradition of the Vajra-Essence teachings,
text.en-trans: dorjé nyingpö ringluk lang né lar

text.en: And once again display, for abusers and slanderers,
text.en-trans: shé zhing kurpa debpa nam kyi dön

text.en: All manner of manifestations—to you we pray!
text.en-trans: trulpa natsok tön la solwa deb

text.en: In brief, you generatedbodhicittain front of Buddha Kāśyapa,
text.en-trans: dorna ösung drung du semkyé né

text.en: Then perfected the supreme training in the bodhisattvas’ conduct.
text.en-trans: changchub chöpa lab chen dzokpé tar

text.en: When you finally attain buddhahood as ‘Completely Victorious’,
text.en-trans: nampar gyalwachen du tsang gyawé

text.en: May we be reborn among your foremost students!
text.en-trans: düpa dangpö khor du kyewar shok

text.en: May we see whatever you do with faith and devotion,
text.en-trans: chi dzé lekpar tongwé dégü kyi

text.en: And repeatedly bringing your visage to mind,
text.en-trans: khyö zhal yi la jepa la gompé

text.en: May we never be separated from the supreme lama,
text.en-trans: lama chok dang namyang mindral zhing

text.en: And attain complete enlightenment in one maṇḍala!
text.en-trans: tsombu chik tu ngönpar sangye shok
